snippet: An Illinois man found with bomb-making supplies in an Oklahoma motel room planned to blow up dozens of churches with Molotov cocktails, according to police officials.
abstract: Police say Gregory A Weiler II of Elk Grove Village, Ill, had planned to blow up dozens of churches with Molotov cocktails found in his Oklahoma motel room; Weiler is arrested and charged with violating Oklahoma's anti-terrorism act.
lead_paragraph: An Illinois man found with bomb-making supplies in an Oklahoma motel room planned to blow up dozens of churches with Molotov cocktails, according to police officials.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Man Accused of Plotting to Bomb Churches
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Man Accused of Plotting To Bomb Churches
